A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a casual fan\, I am now more excited than ever about the future of Star Wars. In my opinion this is the very first good Star Wars. The others have all been fun to watch\, but this was the first one that is actually a good movie. Its true that this movie is very diferent from the others\, but that is a good thing\, most Star Wars movies have been poorly written Space Operas. And I'm talking about the original trilogy as much as anything. I'm probably going to have to go back and see this one again in theaters. I haven't done that since The Lord of The Rings were in theater.
